Slaying victim remembered as nurturing

Hundreds of people gathered in Gazebo Park in Wilbraham Wednesday night to pay respects to Amy Lord, a Wilbraham native. Lord, who was killed after being abducted Tuesday morning, was remembered as a vibrant, nurturing leader.
